body: Crossing the Barbed Wire blogs about the experience of Marta Diaz Rondon, who was reportedly imprisoned and beaten by "men who claim to be patriots and protectors of Cuba’s security."
original_body: Crossing the Barbed Wire blogs about the experience of Marta Diaz Rondon, who was reportedly imprisoned and beaten by "men who claim to be patriots and protectors of Cuba’s security."
title: Cuba: Marta's Victory
